author: Farnaz Fassihi
title: U.S. Secretly Offered Iran a Channel for Talks on Prisoners
text:
The Trump administration secretly reached out to Iran in December to propose creating a direct channel to negotiate the release of prisoners held by each side, U.S. officials and people briefed about the discussions said, marking the first U.S. diplomatic overture to Iran on the issue under President Donald Trump.
... RELATED VIDEO What Is the 2015 Iran Nuclear Deal? Iran reached a historic agreement with major world powers over its nuclear program in 2015. Under the deal, what did Iran give up and how is it benefiting? WSJâ€™s Niki Blasina explains.
